actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the national emergency provisions of the Labor-Management Relations Act, 1947, so as to provide for dissolution of injunctions thereunder only upon settlement of disputes.

summary.text: Provides that when an injunction has been issued in a national emergency situation prohibiting a labor strike or lockout, such injunction shall g be dissolved only upon settlement of the dispute (presently upon such settlement or upon secret balloting by the employees of employers involved). (Amends 29 U.S.C. 179(b), 180)

titles.title: A bill to amend the national emergency provisions of the Labor-Management Relations Act, 1947, so as to provide for dissolution of injunctions thereunder only upon settlement of disputes.
